players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Bob: "Diana is dead. This is a terrible start to the game. We need to figure out who did this. I'm a villager and I have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to help me deduce who the mafia might be..."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "That's a bold lie, Alice. I'm a villager. Why are you trying to mislead us?"
Charlie: "Alice is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Bob last night - he's a villager. Alice must be the mafia trying to frame me."

Bob: "Charlie's claim that he's the detective and investigated me is very suspicious. If he were the detective, why would he reveal that to everyone and risk the mafia targeting him? Also, Alice claimed to investigate Charlie and found him to be mafia. If Charlie is..."
You: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and I investigated him. He is mafia. Bob, trust me and vote for Charlie."
